abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes New York City Police Dept is investigating aggressive panhandling by young men who claim to be trying to sell CDs of their music; describe observing some of these men and securing copy of one of CDs, which turned out to be blank.
lead_paragraph: Detectives in the New York Police Department are cracking down on aggressive panhandling by some selling CDs to people on the street.

headline.main: Hawking CDs on the Street, Swindlers Find Being Pushy and Persistent Pays
headline.print_headline: Hawking CDs on the Street, Swindlers Find Being Pushy and Persistent Pays

snippet: Detectives in the New York Police Department are cracking down on aggressive panhandling by some selling CDs to people on the street.
